byline: Sam Beard, David Gura, Tracey Samuelson, David Weinberg, Gigi Douban, Rob Schmitz and Kai Ryssdal
title: Marketplace for Tuesday, March 19, 2013
teaser: Keeping a close eye on the latest developments in Cyprus, where residents are revolting against a planned savings account tax. Plus, we look at why more homeowners are going from underwater to above water on their mortgages and what it means for the economy. That, and all the numbers from Wall Street and beyond.
description: Keeping a close eye on the latest developments in Cyprus, where residents are revolting against a planned savings account tax. Plus, we look at why more homeowners are going from underwater to above water on their mortgages and what it means for the economy. That, and all the numbers from Wall Street and beyond.
